title: I just read 'It Ends With Us' by Colleen Hoover and I really loved it. What are some good young adult books? - Quora

response.answer_text: These are some good YA books. I hope you like them : One of Us is Lying - Karen M. McManusLooking for Alaska - John greenThe Hate You give- Angie ThomasEvery last word - Tamara Ireland StoneAristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe - Benjamin Alire SáenzWe were liars - E. LockhartA Very Large Expanse of Sea - Tahereh MafiThe Trials of Apollo - Rick RiordanAm I Normal Yet? - Holly BourneThe Boy Who Steals Houses - C.G. DrewsYou and Me and Us: A Novel- Alison HammerI'll give you the Sun - Jandy Nelson-Sarah
